original_text: Next, the Israelites went through the desert, around the edge of Edom and Moab. They arrived on the east side of Moab's land. They put up their tents on the other side of the Arnon river, which was the border of Moab's land. They did not go into Moab.
korean_text: 그 후에 광야를 지나 에돔 땅과 모압 땅을 돌아서 모압 땅의 해 뜨는 쪽으로 들어가 아르논 저쪽에 진 쳤고 아르논은 모압의 경계이므로 모압 지역 안에는 들어가지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: Next, the Israelites went through the desert
around the edge of Edom and Moab
They arrived on the east side of Moab's land
on the other side of the Arnon river
which was the border of Moab's land
They did not go into Moab
